title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and chat with code via Ollama.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama 3, CodeLlama, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown output.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes and answer questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers threads via Ollama with slash commands and DMs.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot using python-telegram-bot to chat with Ollama models privately or in groups.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama as generator or embedder in pipelines.
